text: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ خَلۡقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱخۡتِلَٰفُ أَلۡسِنَتِكُمۡ وَأَلۡوَٰنِكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡعَٰلِمِينَ
translation: 22. Kaadu kay nabnaa kee dudda tascasse astootik tanim qaranwaa kee baaxô ginooy, sin afittee kee sin bisitteh (belitteh) sissinaane. Diggah tohut yaaxigeeh, bagi inti­ le marah astooti tan.
